column6: Still hiding the fact that he's stolen the Ant-Man suit, Eric decides to use his off hours to do a little practice--unfortunately for him, the Helicarrier has developed a bit of a pest problem, and he hasn't learned how to talk to insects yet!
column8: | colorist:Bill Crabtree | penciller (cover):Phil Hester | writer:Robert Kirkman | inker:Ande Parks | letterer:Rus Wooton
